desc: Started in 2004, Shaarei Zion is the first and only Sephardic Shul in Hollis Hills, NY. We take great pride in helping the community grow. What used to be a single home is being transformed into a dynamic and highly accessible community center and shul and most importantly it's very own Women's Mikvah.

layout.text: TAKE PART IN THE MITZVAH OF BUILDING A MIKVAH THAT CAN CHANGE LIVES!
